headers.subject: [tosdr:2819] Yelp [bad]: Yelp claims right to modify user content

html:
In the Yelp TOS pt.5.B Yelps right to "use" user content includes "use, copy, publicly perform and display, reproduce, distribute, modify, translate, remove, analyze, commercialize, and prepare derivative works of (users) Content."

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Yelp [bad]: Yelp claims right to modify user content
text:
In the Yelp TOS <http://www.yelp.com/static?p=tos&country=US> pt.5.B Yelps 
right to "use" user content includes "use, copy, publicly perform and 
display, reproduce, distribute, modify, translate, remove, analyze, 
commercialize, and prepare derivative works of (users) Content."

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
